definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")
household/dwelling/family/sb else's house/household business/house of woman's husband-to-be/CL:戶|户[hu4],家[jia1]
other people/sb else/he, she or they/I, me (referring to oneself as "one" or "people")

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司還經營化學產品和家產品進出口的業務。

sentences.english: "The software company did not charge us too much, " says Feng.
sentences.chinese: “那家軟件公司也沒跟我們要很多錢，”馮說。

sentences.english: Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，運傢俱的大卡車正在往他們家的車道上倒車呢。

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算鏟完整條路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: For a boy of fourteen his own home is the only Paradise.
sentences.chinese: 對於一個十四歲的男孩來說，自己的家就像是個天堂。

sentences.english: They went to my home on time and brough gifts to me .
sentences.chinese: 他們去我的家在時間和布拉夫禮物給我。

sentences.english: Then, with the moon sister Xiaotu to its home.
sentences.chinese: 接着，月亮姐姐帶着小兔來到了它的家。

sentences.english: If you’re a burglar, tell me how to keep bad guys out of my house.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一個盜賊，告訴我怎樣讓壞蛋遠離我的家。

sentences.english: Astrologers think of the water-bearer as pouring life-enhancing energy into the ether.
sentences.chinese: 占星學家認爲這個水瓶，是將生命的能量注入靈性。

sentences.english: When all men think alike, no man thinks very much.
sentences.chinese: 除夜家皆一樣唸的時間便出有人多唸了。

sentences.english: II. 199 foreign business invested commercial enterprises need to make rectifications after sorting out.
sentences.chinese: 經過清理需要進行整改的外商投資商業企業199家。

sentences.english: The developer is under the family, is responsible for land which digests encircles .
sentences.chinese: 開發商是“下家”，負責消化圈來的土地。

sentences.english: She saw the light burning and ran the rest of the way to her house.
sentences.chinese: 她看到點亮的燈光，跑完了剩下的路到了家。

sentences.english: Toto I've got a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.
sentences.chinese: 託託，我有一種感覺我們再也葷芻了家了。

sentences.english: Fourteen of us won't be flying to Tonks's parents'.
sentences.chinese: 我們十四個人並不都飛往唐克斯的父母家。

definition: the whole family/the same family/the family ... (when preceded by a family name)/group
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
